name: Psycho Sync Rails
description:
• The player has the ability to manipulate platforms through the world, the movement of these platforms is all tied to the same mechanic and one can not move without the other doing so. Proper manipulation of these objects in tandem with one another is key to success in this game.

    KEYBOARD and GAMEPAD support included. MOUSE required. 

    Created in Unreal Engine 4 for the Gamemaker's Toolkit 2021 Game Jam

    Credits:
  • Linus "Traggey" Asplund - Art, Level Design, Game Design
    https://www.artstation.com/traggey
  • Yun-Shuo "Kreekakon" Cheng - Programming, Game Design
  • Wood Man/DJ HC1 AKA Cheech & Chong AKA Woody Woodpecker - Sound, Music
    https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg4royyjtM7OCbA32_244pA https://soundcloud.com/user-583373689
  • @Sashko_Naganuma - Music
    https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZuFDYTXnewKPAT0__kGPHA
